= Installation =
 * Unpack files in your project (replace !UserIdentity.php)
 * Insert to config/main.php 
{{{
'components'=>array(
#...
	'User'=>array(
	    'class' => 'User',
	),
#...
),
}}}
 * Create tables (dump files schema.mysql.sql and schema.sqlite.sql)
